text: Kogda k nim yavilos' ot Allakha Pisaniye, podtverzhdayushcheye istinnost' tekh [Pisaniy], chto u nikh byli, - ved' ran'she oni isprashivali pobedu nad nevernymi, - tak, kogda k nim yavilos' to, o chem bylo im izvestno zaraneye, oni otvergli yego. Da budet proklyatiye Allakha nad neveruyushchimi
